title: SGC Graded N162 Dunlap for Trade
author: Archive

posts.post_title: SGC Graded N162 Dunlap for Trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Kevin Cummings
Freshly back from SGC grading. Nice colors, corners, back. No damage. Centering killed the grade.

Looking for Old Judges from my want list below in trade. Will consider cash offers only if no trade material is available.

N172 Old Judge Players – Charlie Bastian, Thomas Burns, Mike Griffin (arms folded or batting), Frank Hankinson, William Hoover, Michael Hughes, John Kelly, Jim McGarr (with umpire), Charlie Reipschlager, Taylor Shaffer, George Shoch (with umpire), Leon Viau, James White, Art Whitney & dog, Ed Williamson & mascot
N172 Old Judge Teams - Hartford, Jersey City, Lowell, Mansfield, Wilkes-Barre
